price: 48.Nabiyow ku marak koros koo kee koo kataate mari A-nee kah xagnissa Qhiyaamah ayroh digaala maawaqadiiy?isin numma yacee mara tekkeenik iyyan.
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
